text: The Metropolitan City of Venice is a metropolitan city in the Veneto region, Italy. It is one of ten metropolitan cities in Italy. Its capital is the city of Venice. It replaced the Province of Venice in 2015 and includes the city of Venice and 43 other municipalities (comuni). It was first created by the reform of local authorities (Law 142/1990) and then established by the Law 56/2014. Category:2015 establishments in Italy
title: Metropolitan City of Venice
